name: Surviving the 80's
description:
Can You keep the Cold War Cold in Surviving the 80's? The Cold War Management Simulator! In this game, you play as new global superpower alongside the US and USSR and try to keep the tensions from blowing into full-scale nuclear war. You Anwser Surveys from the United Nations to affect your Overall Relations and See how well you're doing in the "Cold War Top Nations" Leaderboard! Can you find out how to stop it and even stop it Early?!? Find out all the endings when it releases soon for your web browser. Desktop Release is TBD.

A Less Buggy Version of the Game is Available for your web browser but is not near game completion.
